name: Dawn of Seltiria
description:
Dawn of Seltiria RPG 

 An RPG about a band of heroes investigating a sudden monster rampage.  

Story:  

In a planet called Seltiria, humans and benevolent monsters called Luminus were created by “The Divine Creator”, coexisting to help each other. However, the Luminus started to go berserk, attacking humans with unknown reason. Lentis and his three friends are tasked by King Roland to investigate as to why the Luminus have now become their enemies, as the four discovers a shocking truth of their planet’s status.  

Characters:

  • Lentis Elga – First Leader of the Extermination Group and one of the elite Paladins of Childe Kingdom.
  • Nobel Osrow – Fifth Leader of the Extermination Group and one of the Royal Knights of Childe Kingdom, who overlooks the public safety of the townspeople.
  • Pirina Lesca – a Fighter-Mage from Arimia and the trusted mage partner of Lentis.
  • Alizee Lesca – a Priestess from Arimia, the elder sister of Pirina and the battle nurse partner of Lentis.
    •  

STAFF  

Story, Event Programming, Design and Lead Development: Tatsumi
